title: Firefox updates
content: Why must I suffer whenever a Firefox update is coming??? The same thing happens when Microsoft is going to update Windows. Everything slows to a crawl. At least monster Microsoft puts a little green dot on my power icon to let me know an update is on the way. Can't you notify me in advance, so I don't get caught in the whirlpool of everything slowing down? It even slows down my Microsoft Word. I didn't think my browser would affect that. PLEASE ANSWER. I thought you guys were cool alternatives to the big, commercial guys.
creator: larryhof

title: Easy Youtube Video Downloader Express no longer working in Firefox 88
content:
The selection for "Download " is no longer available on any Youtube page ....... I have re-installed Easy Youtube Video Downloader Express several times, but the problem persists

I'm using Firefox 88.0.1 on Windows 10, Home Version 20H2 Build 1904264.964 64bit.
creator: zeppo5000

title: No puedo cambiar mi correo de mi cuenta firefox
content:
Quiero cambiar el correo de mi cuenta . De hotmail a gmail pero me sale que debo poner una contraseña diferente .

Secondary email must be different than your account email

Las cuentas son similares pero de distinto cliente , use una cuenta distinta de spam la cual es totalmente distinta , pero ahora no puedo ingresar mi correo real ( parecido al viejo).
creator: hunterklaken

title: Font keeps changing to Symbol font in broswers, web sites and emails
content:
Will not hold a font - I have to clear history and then reboot computer then it's fine for a about an hour then changes to a Symbol font - goes from Times to Times Symbol. see screen shot below .

Yes I have gone into preferences and changed the font to Helvetica now but still changes to times symbols after about an hour - never had this problem before downloading 88.0.1 (64-bit)
creator: sue.kramer

title: What happened to Firefox Version 88.0.1?
content:
Is this known behavior? Has it been reported to Mozilla? Found nothing from a search.

What happened to FireFox Version 88.0.1? I updated to this version yesterday after a lot of nagging from popups.

Prob 1. Try to open a link from email and I get, "Secure Connection Failed An error occurred during a connection to input.mozilla.org. PR_CONNECT_ABORTED_ERROR The page you are trying to view cannot be shown because the authenticity of the received data could not be verified. Please contact the website owners to inform them of this problem."

When I try the same link in Safari, which tends to be grumpier than Firefox about security issues. it works just fine; no complaints and the page opens.

Prob 2 ( IMO related ). Try to open a bookmark and I get, "The connection was reset

The connection to the server was reset while the page was loading. 

   The site could be temporarily unavailable or too busy. Try again in a few moments.    If you are unable to load any pages, check your computer’s network connection.    If your computer or network is protected by a firewall or proxy, make sure that Firefox is permitted to access the Web."

Again, when I try the same link or site in Safari, works just fine.

OS MacOS Big Sur Version 11.2.3
creator: pwityk

title: Firefox download prompt closing tab or window if open too long?
content:
I recently noticed that if I am downloading or opening a file, if I do not click open or save fast enough it will Firefox will close the tab or window from which I am trying to download.

This seems to have started with version 88, but I am not sure.

The close can happen after just a few seconds to possibly over a minute.

To replicate I need to click on file link and when the dialog box come up to open or save, I just leave the dialog without making a selection and then the tab or window closes leaving the ope dialog box.

Can anybody tell me what this is called or how to stop this behavior?
creator: elkinm

title: 일부 사이트 전체커서 드레그 불가
content: 안녕하세요 기존엔 잘 되었다가 어느순간 부터 브라우져상 글 또는 숫자를 복사하려 커서를 드레그하면 전체가 안되고 일부만 드레그 되고 있습니다 다른 크롬은 잘되는것으로 확인하였고 해당 파이어폭스에서만 나타나는 증상으로 설정을 다르게 해야 하는지 문의 드립니다.
creator: kjhw3422

title: Copy-Paste Function - Double images posted on FF
content:
I've been having issues with double-images being pasted on Firefox 88.0.1 (64-bit). I find it annoying because I end up deleting the second image on the site that I'm working on.

Initially, i thought that the keyboard that I'm using was a bit sensitive however, when I do paste of the screenshot that I've taken via other web browser (Chrome, Edge, Opera), it only pastes 1 image.

I've been reading some archived articles but nothing was mentioned about a fix on Firefox (or unless I've missed it). Is there something that I need to disable/enable on the Settings page?
creator: d0nnsk1.x

title: playing video on YouTube, when controls visible, half video palyback has horizontal lines
content: I was on DashCams Australia, for this example. This started happening about a month ago, after an update (of course). I have also updated to see if it fixes. Some youtube videos this doesn't happen with. Don't ask me to identify playback method. I just click play Firefox Settings is to block audio and video autoplay globally. I'll select when a video is to play Linux 20.04 KDE Plasma 5 Firefox 87.0 Ublock, Noscript, HTTPS Everywhere, Privacy Badger
creator: charles.davids.1999
